sentences.en: Adjustable settings allow you to customize the function to fit your needs.
sentences.cn: 可调设定,让你定制功能,以符合您的需求.

sentences.en: Customize corresponding testing criteria and procedures for different products.
sentences.cn: 根据不同产品的要求,制定相应的测试标准及流程.

sentences.en: Describe how the players can customize the multiplayer experience.
sentences.cn: 描述玩家如何定制自己的多人游戏.

sentences.en: Learn how to customize the displaying of the property names and descriptions.
sentences.cn: 这个项目演示了如何定制属性名和描述的显示.

sentences.en: This allows applications to customize the library functions available to Lua applications.
sentences.cn: 这使得应用程序可以为lua程序自定义库的可用功能.

sentences.en: This series chiller can customize base on the requirement of acidstant.
sentences.cn: 此系列冷水机可订做耐酸碱式.

sentences.en: To change system or user locale settings, click Customize.
sentences.cn: 要改变系统或用户区域设置, 请单击“自定义”.

sentences.en: Users can customize of specifications the products of the length.
sentences.cn: 用户可定制各种规格,长度的产品.

sentences.en: You can customize the behavior of the Asynchronous Server and hence re-brand it by defining your own command set for invoking services.
sentences.cn: 通过定义自己调用服务的命令集，您可以定制自定义异步服务器的行为，通过为调用服务定义自己的命令集从而对它重新标记。

sentences.en: You can customize the name of the Program Shortcuts folder.
sentences.cn: 您可以自定义程序快捷方式文件夹的名称.

sentences.en: You can customize the software in several ways.
sentences.cn: 你可用几种方法按需要编制这个软件。

sentences.en: You can customize video profiles video and parameters for output video.
sentences.cn: 您可以自定义视频简介视频和参数视频输出.

sentences.en: You can customize your skates, as you like to skate.
sentences.cn: 你可以按照你所从事的轮滑项目,定制你的鞋.

sentences.en: You can not customize headers from two places at the same time.
sentences.cn: 不允许从两个地方同时定制标题.

sentences.en: You only specify particular functions when you customize in Financial Accounting.
sentences.cn: 你在用户化财务会计的时候,也就具体化“公司”了.

words.tran_cn: 自定义；客制化；自定义级别
定制；按特别订货生产（customize的过去式和过去分词）
依照顾客具体要求而制造（等于customize）

trans.tran_cn: 定做，按客户具体要求制造
trans.tran_en: to change something to make it more suitable for you, or to make it look special or different from things of a similar type
to change something to make it more suitable for you, or to make it look special or different from things of a similar type
